snippet: "Stories We Tell," Sarah Polley's documentary exploration of her own family, and "Upstream Color," Shane Carruth's follow-up to "Primer," are among the seven films announced for the program presented by the Museum of Modern Art and the Film Society...
abstract: "Stories We Tell," Sarah Polley's documentary exploration of her own family, and "Upstream Color," Shane Carruth's follow-up to "Primer," are among the seven films announced for the program presented by the Museum of Modern Art and the Film Society of Lincoln Center.

headline.main: Seven Features Announced for New Directors/New Films Series
headline.print_headline: New Directors/New Films Names Seven Offerings
